response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Given its value and significance, we believe it's worth every penny of its $12,000 price tag. Considering its worth to you, would you be interested in acquiring this product at this price?
